550b9316-350a-46dd-992a-f478ddfa9e8a.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed the training and passed the exams in the Inpowered® Corporate Coach methodology for Executive and Leader Coaching for organizations. Earners understand how to deliver a coaching engagement and how to engage with all parties for aligned support of the client and the goals of the engagement. Earners understand how to support clients to success with a focus that may include "whole person", "whole role" based on client needs. Up to 16.5 CCEUs.
550b9316-350a-46dd-992a-f478ddfa9e8a.name: Executive Coach - Training Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: The Inpowered® Executive Coach Training includes a methodology to support coaches to deliver high value executive and leader coaching engagements for organizations. Phase 0: Preparation includes the overview of the engagement approach. Phase 1:Training is a deep dive into each of the 6 Modules of the Inpowered® Corporate Coach method. Coaches who complete the full Certification Program and who are not Credentialed by the International Coach Federation, will also earn this Certificate.

af044e45-5b9c-4e08-827c-202cf482dd8d.description: Earners of this badge can skillfully deliver high value Executive and Leader Coaching for organizations. Earners are adept at understanding how to use their coaching skills and how to engage with all parties to the coaching engagement for aligned support of the client and the goals of the engagement. Earners also understand how to support clients to success inside the system in which they seek it. Earners focus includes supporting the client "whole person", "whole role" to meet client needs.
af044e45-5b9c-4e08-827c-202cf482dd8d.name: Certified Executive Coach

alignments.name: International Coach Federation
alignments.description: This Certification requires being credentialed by the International Coach Federation (ICF) and augments coaching skills with what is needed to meet the incremental needs of organizations. Coaches who complete our Certification program who are not yet credential by the ICF, may earn an "Executive Coaching Certificate" instead of a "Certification".

badge_template_activities.title: The Inpowered® Executive Coach Certification Program uses a 5-phased best practice approach to support coaches to have what they need to deliver high value executive and leader coaching engagements for organizations. Phase 0: Preparation overview of the method. Phases 1-4, focus on each of the 6 Modules in the Inpowered® Corporate Coach method: Phase1: Training. Phase 2: Action Learning assignments. Phase 3: Coaching Circle Challenges & Phase 4: Final Exam. Can be done in Cohort or Self Study.

dd368125-b390-45f8-8767-dbdde418d7b6.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed training and passed the training exams in the Inpowered® Leadership Coaching method for leaders at organizations. Earners understand how to augment their coaching skills with leadership competency-based development best practices to support leaders to elevate their leadership effectiveness in both one-on-one coaching and leadership development programs and workshops. Up to 15 CCEUs (RDs).

badge_template_activities.title: The Inpowered® Leadership Coach Training Certificate Program verifies that the coach has completed the training modules and has passed the exams in the method and resources to deliver high value leadership coaching by augmenting their coaching skills with Leadership competency-based development best practices.
